channel.title: My name got changed from Shrimp to Shrimp2 without my permission
channel.description: A couple hours ago I was Shrimp, now I'm Shrimp2. What the heck? It won't let me change it back to Shrimp. What is going on? Is my account hacked?

item.title: My name got changed from Shrimp to Shrimp2 without my permission

item.title: My name got changed from Shrimp to Shrimp2 without my permission
item.dc:creator: Weizen1988
item.description:
Yep, sorry about that Shrimpy. Its a new system we rolled out last night I believe. First person who picked the name kept it, anyone afterwards got a number attached so we can tell them apart.

Read full topic
item.source: My name got changed from Shrimp to Shrimp2 without my permission

This is just to confirm that is not a bug when someone else reported a similar problem with their IGN
